DOC.brief_title: Study Dehydroepiandrosterone Treatment Poor Responders In Vitro Fertilization Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Poor responder IVF treatment occur 5-24 % in-vitro fertilisation ( IVF ) cycle , result cancellation cycle translate low pregnancy rate . Current intervention base upon use different stimulation regimen address fundamental underlying physiological basis follicular recruitment development . The over-riding objective proposal devise novel therapeutic approach treatment poor responder IVF treatment dietary supplementation Dehydroepiandrosterone ( DHEA ) . The investigator hypothesise DHEA supplementation lead improvement ovarian steroidogenesis poor responder , lead improve IVF outcome . Specifically , investigator aim 1 . Conduct prospective randomise control trial ( RCT ) effect DHEA supplementation woman poor responder IVF treatment . 2 . Investigate effect DHEA supplementation ovarian steroidogenesis biochemical ultrasonographic marker ovarian reserve .
DOC.criteria: All woman meet one two follow Bologna criterion poor responder : abnormal ovarian reserve test ( AMH < 1.0 ng/mL FSH > 10 IU/L ) , few 4 oocyte retrieve few 4 follicle observe previous IVF stimulation cycle either standard long antagonist protocol Where inform consent obtain Previous current DHEA supplementation Previous current use corticosteroid Major systemic illness Allergy DHEA
